price: ហើយហ្វៀរអោនបាននិយាយថាៈ ចូរពួកអ្នកនាំអ្នកដែល ពូកែខាងមន្ដអាគមទាំងអស់មកកាន់យើង។
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
